source.sqlReaderQuery:
select pac_reg as CD_PESSOA_FISICA, 
rtrim(ltrim(pac_nome)) AS NM_PESSOA_FISICA, 
pac_numcpf AS NR_CPF, 
convert(char(10),pac_nasc,121) as DT_NASCIMENTO, 
PAC_CELULAR AS NR_TELEFONE_CELULAR,
pac_fone AS NR_TELEFONE, 
'13188370000227' AS CNPJ,
'DAYHORC -  UNIDADE ITAIGARA' as DS_UNIDADE,
'DH' as MARCA,
pac_reg as NR_PRONTUARIO,
pac_dreg as DT_CADASTRO_ORIGINAL,
pac_dult as DT_ATUALIZACAO
from pac
inner join usr on USR_LOGIN = PAC_USR_LOGIN_CAD
